title: Ep255 Vineyard Villains
description:
This week, the gals head to their favorite venue to chat about wayward wineries. Topics include a town with a curiously high rate of deafness, a brutal string of slayings, and a body on the beach. Pour a hefty glass of the highly exclusive Tom Hoben Private Reserve Cabernet, inscribe your jewelry, and tune in for Vineyard Villains.
